VIDEO: Skromne želje malega Dejana (11): Rad bi se le normalno oprhal
Najstnik si želi le to, kar imajo njegovi sošolci.
07 Nov 2019, 12:36 by N. B.
DONJI AGIĆI – Skoraj za vsakega od nas je kopalnica nekaj samoumevnega, prav tako prostor, kamor se lahko umaknemo. Iz Bosne in Hercegovine pa prihaja žalostna zgodba, ki prikazuje, da vsi nimajo te sreče.Komaj 11-letni Dejan Zorič živi v stari skromni hiši skupaj z očetom, babico in dedkom. Kopalnice nimajo, spijo v skupnih prostorih, kjer se najstnik tudi uči, saj nima svoje sobe.»Želim si kopalnico, kjer bi se lahko normalno oprhal, tako kot se moji prijatelji,« je dejal tamkajšnjemu novinarju. Fant si želi tudi svojo sobo, kjer bi se lahko v miru učil in igral.



V hiši, ki dobesedno razpada, skoraj vsak dan zmanjka elektrike. V šolo, ki je od doma oddaljena več kot štiri kilometre, vsak dan hodi peš. Kljub težkim razmeram si Dejan nikdar ne bi želel živeti v mestu, saj je, kot pravi, na vasi rojen, tam pa ima tudi prijatelje in družino.

VIDEO: Modest wishes of little Dejan (11): I just want to get a normal shower
A teenager only wants what his classmates have.
07 Nov 2019, 12:36 by N. B.
LOWER AGICI - Almost every one of us has a bathroom for granted, as well as a place to escape. However, a sad story comes from Bosnia and Herzegovina, which shows that not everyone is having this luck. They do not have bathrooms, they sleep in common rooms where the teenager also learns because he does not have his own room. The boy also wants his own room where he can study and play in peace.



The house, which is literally falling apart, runs out of electricity almost every day. The school, which is more than four kilometers away from home, walks daily on foot. Despite the difficult conditions, Dejan would never want to live in the city, as he is born in the village, but also has friends and family there.
